1�You open the tome to the ??Moogle's Almanack?? chapter and peruse its weather prognostication pages.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????.

1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.

1�Enter the cave?Yes.No.
1�Leave the cave?Yes.No.
1�The Orc barrier seals it shut.
1�Leave the cave?Yes.No.
1�Place the 3?????Place it.Not now.
1�Oh yeah, I almostaru forgot. Monsters flock to those red pools like flies to Quadav droppings. You watch yourself out there!
1�Huh? You really wantaru into that cave? Hah! Not after I went through all that trouble sealing off the Orc lord...
1�Especially not now, with reinforcements on the way! Bestaru to stay outta that cave, I say!
1�But...you made it this far. Guess I'll give you a chance!
1�Take your chances?Yes.No.
1�Humph. Sissy!
1�Alrighty, then. Pass my test, and I'll let you into that meanie-weanie old cave.
1�I'm going to give you 6????, which you are to dip in the four red pools of Davoi. You'll know the orb is absorbing magic when its color changes!
1�Once you're done, bring it back here and I'll grade you!
1�Heeeey, don't worry! Long as nothing...unexpected happens, you'll do just fine! I guarantee it! Bonne chance!
1�Have you been to the cave to the south? Best to stay away if you know the danger! Not that it's all that easy to find the way in there...
1�Heeeey, so you made it back in one piece? Good, good! Oh, I forgot to tell you one thing: if an orb turns totally red, it gets cursed.
1�W-w-wait a second! Isn't that 6???? you have there!?
1�Well, I guess all's well that ends well! This is aboutaru all the power you'll need, methinks.
1�Let me just give it the barrier-disruption spells it so very much deserves...
1�The mage's magic transforms the cursed orb into 6????.
1�And there you go! Take that 3???? and stick it into the barrier. That should disruptaru the thing long enough for you to go in.
1�Take care and don't let the Orcs get it! There now, off you go! Good luck!
1�Ahhh... You know, I'm sure I'm forgetting something...
1�What was that now? Hmm...
1�Ah, one more thing...4...Yah!
1�The 3???? has been drained of magic.
..�I've been using my power to seal the brutish-wutish Orcish Overlord in the caves just beyond here. I mustaru continue my efforts until the reinforcements arrive.
1�However, my concentration for maintaining the seal is being disruptarued. An Orc carrying  $???? has been enspelling me from afar...
1�...Hm?Why did I run away from the Aurastery? That's something I prefer not to talk about...
1�When the reinforcements arrive from San d'Oria, I'll return to Windurst. The professor mustaru have forgotten about Mojiji by now.
1�Huh? He's still getting letters. But, I'm not writing them anymore!
1�...Ah, justaru the person I wanted to see.There's something I wanted to ask you...
1�How did you use that malevolent magic doll to track me down?
1�The 3????!?So this ring is what broughtaru about my discovery.Well, I can't just throw it away...
1�Hmmm, what to do?Here, I'll give it to you for safekeeping. Please hold on to it until I return to the Aurastery.
1�I will return as soon as the reinforcements arrive from San d'Oria.
1�Ah, dear old Windurst, how long has it been? I wonder if I still remember the way to the Aurastery?
1�I am Bernal, of the Royal Knights of San d'Oria.
1�The mage in this tower has trapped the Orc lord inside a cave to the south. Now we just wait for reinforcements.
1�Actually, my friend Quemaricond left for the homeland quite some time ago. I do hope the message made it through.
1�Have you business at the tower?
1�Enter the tower?Yes.No.
1�You've finished what you came here to do?
1�Leave the tower?Yes.No.
1�I cannot leave my post, but I pray for your success. Pick your fights wisely, and be not afraid to run if your enemy outnumbers you.
1�Incidentally...
4?�Move the lever?Yes.No.
1�Move the lever?Yes.No.
1�Move the lever?Yes.No.
4?�Move the lever?Yes.No.
1�A message? Finally! I am Zantaviat of the Temple Knights. I've been monitoring Orc activity here for several weeks. They grow stronger in numbers by the day.
1�The Temple Knights have been observing Davoi through a number of methods. We've collected our findings in a document: 6????.
1�However...one of our men infiltrated the area last night, and ran into an Orc hunting party on his way out. He dropped the last page of his report before he could escape.
1�The Orcs caught wind of our presence, so we could not retrieve the lost page so easily.
1�According to our man, the page lies somewhere near the platform on the small pond up ahead. Go retrieve it for us.
1�With the Orcs on alert, any direct attack would only incite their full wrath. Take care not to be discovered!
1�I am Zantaviat, a scout for San d'Oria. I was sent to watch the Orc camps in Davoi. Be careful, it's a veritable nest of beastmen in there.
1�Ah, it's you,  . I was waiting for you. Let us dispense with the formalities; we want you to infiltrate Davoi.
1�Davoi is the central stronghold of the Orcs. We have delved as deep as we dare, but there is still much we do not know.
1�Come to think of it, an adventurer came along the other day. He told me to be strong out here by myself, and then he was off towards Davoi all alone. Got courage, that one.
1�But that is neither here nor there, eh?
1�Let me explain your mission. There are three Orc settlements in Davoi: East Block, South Block, and North Block.
1�We know that they've left coded memos concerning all three blocks. They should be somewhere in East Block.
1�East Block is not far from this entrance. I want you to find three of those coded memos.
1�Be aware that this mission will surely require combat. You way wish to gather a party to aid you.
1�You found the page! Well done. Now the 3???? is complete. Take this to San d'Oria swiftly. Give it to the lord knight at the gatehouse.
1�That's all three blocks covered. I will notify the homeland of your contribution. All you need to do is return to San d'Oria and report in at the gatehouse.
1�You found the page! Well done. Now the 3???? is complete. Take this to San d'Oria swiftly and deliver it to Prince Pieuje.

1�??
�-
-
??Wait where the water falls.
1�Read the letter again?Yes.No.
1�??Captain Exoroche:I, Chusarlaud, am no longer worthy to be a Royal Knight, for I have sold our secrets to the Orcs.
1�I spent my reward on medicine for my mother, but it was all in vain. Her death taught me the error of my ways, and I tried repeatedly to redeem myself.
1�But my partner Vilbert threatened to expose my treachery if I did not continue! Alas, he had me in the palm of his hand!
1�I had to take action! I decided to send this letter upon the close of today's training. I expect no forgiveness, but I must put a stop to this madness.
1�I have caused pain to my mother, and I have betrayed my kind captain. There is no other way!??
1�The letter ends abruptly.
1�You work the pulley.
1�Dipping the letter into the water, you see words appear.
1�Read the letter again?Yes.No.
1�Ahahahahaha!There it is! It's on that Tarutaru!
u.�The 0???? jumps in your hand
a!�Ahahahahaha!You're almost on top of it!It's somewhere in this are
1�Well, no matter. The fact is, there is someone else who is looking for the sword. And, either they have got to it first or...
1�...nuisance...
1�Impressive...You don't look like one of Teulomme's lackeys.Who are you?
1�Impressive...You don't look like one of Teulomme's lackeys.Wait...you're that adventurer.
1�Hrmph.So you heard someone was threatening the count, and you were asked to find out who it was?
1�So now that you've found me, it's straight to the Royal Knights, I suppose?
1�No?What an unusual request you've undertaken.
1�No?You always were one for undertaking unusual requests.
1�Very well. Seeing as you've brought me the #????, I should consider you a welcome guest.I'll let you in on a little secret about Count Teulomme.
1�I assume you've heard of Atarefaunet's Band?Did you know their services could be bought for the right price?
1�Even now, most people regard them as little more than a band of particularly vicious thieves.
1�A client utilizing their talents for unsavory deeds could thus escape any incrimination.
1�But after the war ended, the leader of the band, Atarefaunet, was captured by a pair of bounty hunters.
1�Naturally, the band's clients were falling over themselves to have him silenced before all their dirty secrets came to light.
1�One of those clients was our very own Count Teulomme.The man who lords it over the territory of Carpenters' Landing.
1�The count realized that Atarefaunet would eventually be executed under San d'Orian law, but the condemned man needed to be taken care of before any inquisitions into his crimes had begun.
1�And so, he bought off the oubliette guard and arranged for poison to be mixed with Atarefaunet's meal.
1�But this was exactly what Atarefaunet was waiting for.Feigning death by poison was by far the preferable option to hanging or decapitation!
1�Heh-heh...Atarefaunet used this opportunity to erase his existence from the world.
1�And secrets that would cause apoplexy in half a hundred corrupt nobles went with him.
1�How you use this knowledge is up to you.But I suggest you avoid doing anything to cross Atarefaunet--not if you're fond of your current breathing state.
1�After his ??death,?? Atarefaunet slipped off to a nation in the west, yet rumor has it he's surfaced in these lands again.
1�I don't know who your employer is, but for a normal townsperson this knowledge would be fatal.
1�Take that as advice from the executioner.Farewell.
1�I got no interest in dealing with the likes of you. Don'tcha got a home to go to?
1�?5????, ya say? Ya got my jaw dropping, kid. Where did ya hear about things like that?

1�Did ya know that some items have their own soul? After passing through the hands of hundreds of people, not to mention the paws of us beastmen, some items are transformed through contact with all those thoughts and feelings.
1�These transformed items have the ability to focus mysterious powers. Us Goblins often come across this weird phenenom...phemomeno...stuff in our travels.
1�Ya know, if ya really want 6????, I could sell one to ya for the right price.
1�But let me tell ya, kid. Only us Gobs can tell if an item is souled. Not even other beastmen--and definitely not you people--can tell the difference between normal junk and priceless artifacts.
1�Makes me laugh to see you mugs throwing away those items like they was garbage. A souled item is worth a fortune, and ya ain't gonna get one cheap.

1�
 gil, and not a single gil less! Ya got a problem with that, kid?
1�So if ya want one, stop dawdlin' around already and hand me over some money.
1�What's that ya got there? ? $????!?Ya got unusual tastes for a person.

1�Got no clue what ya been doin' with it, but I bet ya gots no use for it anymore.What say I lighten your load in exchange for, say, 
 gil?
1�So whaddaya waitin' for?Hand that #???? right over and let's make a deal.
1�I got a deal for ya, kid.Did ya know that before the Great War, the three nations all had their own currencies?

1�After that little fracas, everyone started using gil as the standard coin, and the other types of money just faded out of existence.Even if you was to find any nowadays, they only have value to Goblin collectors like me.
1�You're looking a bit confused there, kid.Let me show ya what I'm talking about.

1�This one's the least valuable of the lot. It was used as a part of the San d'Orian currency years ago.I know I told ya about the nations all having different currencies, but these San d'Orian coins are the only ones I'm interested in.
1�If ya bring me these coins, I'll exchange them for something from my secret stash of treasure. Ya won't be getting anything for just one of them, so make sure ya collect a bagful, okay?

1�Let me explain the deal.Bring me 
 	)????????, and I'll give ya one #????. Where're ya going? Let me finish, will ya?

1�Once ya got 
 	)????????, ya can trade them for one #????. Or, ya can decide to exchange them for something from my treasure stash. Each item's gonna cost ya a different amount, so choose carefully.

1�Ya can also exchange a #???? for 
 	)????????. Gonna take ya a while to find, kid. Hope you're patient.
1�What is it, kid? Ya got something to ask me?
1�What do you want to ask about?Nothing.Hourglasses.Maps.Old currencies.Trading %????.
1�Old currencies?I was telling ya about how the three nations all used to have different types of money. What, you forgot already?
1�Ya really like your junk, huh? That's what this stuff looks like to most people, and ya just spent a fortune on it. You're my kinda people, kid.
1�By the way, I don't give out receipts, and I don't take back items I already sold. I don't know what ya mean to do with the #???? and I don't much care, so take it and skedaddle.

1�They're not worth a whole lot, but ya done good to collect

1�So you wanna make a deal here?Should be a good one for the both o' us.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Infiltrate Davoi.Vain(pt.1).Vain(pt.2).The Jester Who'd Be King.Tea with a Tonberry?
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
1�Boo-hah-hah?`...kupo!
1�Why do ghosts say ??boo,?? anyway?
1�I heard that going to a dark, scary dungeon is the best way to test your courage.This place definitely qualifies, kupo!
1�Maybe I'm doing something wrong, kupo?
1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...
